## GetTasksRequest.status property

A [task](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/reference/glossary/#task) status. Only returns tasks that have the specified status (`active` or `inactive`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
status?: string;
```
